article_title: What Every Family Should Know About High Deductible Health Insurance

article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman

og.description: High deductibles are here to stay. The average deductible for single coverage under employer plans this year is $1,217. That’s almost double what it was in 2006. The trend is not going to abate. Next year 4 in 5 large employers will offer a high deductible plan and 1 in [...]
